user.name: Glacier View
user.description: Unleashing the creative force. Beauty emerging.  Look at thy inner self and bear it all manfully.

fullText:
Spirits of Undaunted Dead

A healing alchemy returns
            to see the agony
Of thorns,
In my death dealing remains
What destiny awaits.
The wind blows still as
   the spirit dwells
   on fields
where ledges descend
On a body breathing still
   as the hours
   draw near.
The
